post.description:
Create a new job. Either provide vehicleId to reference an existing vehicle,
or provide a vehicle object to auto-create/find by registration.
Similarly, you can provide customerId or a customer object.

vehicleId.description: ID of existing vehicle (use this OR vehicle object)

vehicle.description: Inline vehicle data (finds by registration or creates new)

customerId.description: ID of existing customer (use this OR customer object)

customer.description: Inline customer data (finds by name+phone or creates new)

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of jobs with support for multiple filter criteria including vehicle info, customer details, and date ranges

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by job status

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search across vehicle registration, VIN, chassis number, customer name, and job number

parameters.name: vehicleRegistration
parameters.description: Filter by vehicle registration number (ทะเบียนรถ). Alias 'registration' also supported

parameters.name: customerName
parameters.description: Filter by customer name (ชื่อ-นามสกุล). Alias 'customer' also supported

parameters.name: chassisNumber
parameters.description: Filter by chassis number (เลขตัวถัง). Alias 'chassis' also supported

parameters.name: vinNumber
parameters.description: Filter by VIN number. Alias 'vin' also supported

parameters.name: jobNumber
parameters.description: Filter by job number (เลขที่งาน)

parameters.name: insuranceCompanyId
parameters.description: Filter by insurance company ID (บริษัทประกัน)

parameters.name: startDateFrom
parameters.description: Filter jobs starting from this date (วันเริ่มต้น ตั้งแต่)

parameters.name: startDateTo
parameters.description: Filter jobs up to this date (วันเริ่มต้น ถึง)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by (default is createdAt)

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order - 'asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending

200.description: List of jobs with pagination info

total.description: Total number of jobs matching the filters

patch.description: Update a step's status. employeeId is required when status is 'completed' or 'in_progress'

get.summary: Get all vehicles or find by registration
get.description: Returns paginated list of all vehicles. If `reg` parameter is provided, returns exact match by registration number (for job prefill).

parameters.name: reg
parameters.description: Exact registration number to lookup (e.g., "กข1234"). Returns empty array if not found.

200.description: List of vehicles (or single vehicle if reg parameter provided)
